titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to prevent, for unemployment compensation purposes, service performed by a person committed to a penal institution from being treated as employment.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/4/1997--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to prohibit services provided by penal institution inmates from being treated as employment for unemployment compensation purposes.
